title: The Genie from down under: wishing and hoping
creator_credit: Esben Storm, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, ABC-TV (Australia), Australian Children's Television Foundation and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: When upper class English girl Penelope Townes finds a magic opal which contains two Australian genies, Bruce and his son Baz, she thinks all her problems are over, and that she can have anything she wants. Bruce, however, has other ideas.
